page.title: 14Continuation of page 13
page.content: buildings in Mousehold and they are on the outskirts of Mousehold. There is a prison, Zaks, the Hamburger Bar and the Ranger's house. The ranger looks after the heath and stops all the trouble makers. There is only one thing wrong with Mousehold Heath, a road goes straight through it. This is a major road and is dangerous. People wishing to cross from one side of the heath to the other have no pedestrian crossing. There are two car parks available for the families who come from all over the local area to stroll among the trees or to partake in the sporting activities.In fine weather there are hundreds of people on the Heath and in Winter many children take their toboggans to the hill overlooking the city.They also have snowball fights and build snowmen there.
